    • compileTestClass

      private static TestClassFinder.FileAndPath compileTestClass(long counter, String packageNameSuffix, String classNamePrefix) throws Exception
      Compiles the test class with bogus code into a .class file. Unfortunately it's very tedious.
      Parameters:
      counter - Unique test counter.
      packageNameSuffix - Package name suffix (e.g. ".suffix") for nesting, or "".
      Returns:
      The resulting .class file and the location in jar it is supposed to go to.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • packageAndLoadJar

      private static String packageAndLoadJar(TestClassFinder.FileAndPath... filesInJar) throws Exception
      Makes a jar out of some class files. Unfortunately it's very tedious.
      Parameters:
      filesInJar - Files created via compileTestClass.
      Returns:
      path to the resulting jar file.
      Throws:
      Exception
